Key Match Events: Litton Das run out by KL Rahul for 60 off 27
Bangladesh lost six wickets for 40 runs, in 33 deliveries after Litton's run out
Arshdeep Singh delivered excellent yorkers at the death
India won by 5 runs using DLS method
Pre-Game Insights: KL Rahul's consistent performance with 220 runs at this World Cup
Virat Kohli became the highest run-getter in T20 World Cups
Suryakumar Yadav is the top-ranked T20 batter in the world
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan's drop of Rohit Sharma cost Bangladesh
India's bowlers struggled with the wet outfield
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's Litton Das smashed 56 off 24 in the powerplay
KL Rahul faced 11 of the first 13 balls in the first two overs
Others: The match was part of Group 2 in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022
